name: number of view
author: S. M. Ibrahim Lavlu

sections.description:
A simple plugin to count and display hits of post and pages. On next major release we will add some advance feature.

Now this plugin alos add a widget of popular post by view.

Live preview: visit http://www.lavluda.com
If you have anything to add, please let us know.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • widget- popular post list improved (bulleted list)

1.0.1

  • bug fix, previously it was showing deleted post in popular post widget

1.0.0

  • options page added
  • now you can select the position of view
  • now you can enter your own lable
  • code optimized

0.0.9

  • minor bug fix. it was showing wrong hits for some post in widget

0.0.8

  • popular post widget added

0.0.6

  • post without any hit will display hits = 0 instate of blank

0.0.5

  • extra debug info removed

0.0.4

  • count increase bug for in page

0.0.3

  • first public release

short_description: A simple plugin to count and display hits of post and pages.
